definition: short name for Shanghai
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
a household/door/family
Zhu Guanghu (1949-), PRC soccer coach
alternative name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/at (or in) Shanghai
Shanghai opera
Shanghai-Nanjing line
Shanghai-Nanjing Railway, a.k.a. Huning Railway
Beijing and Shanghai
Beijing-Shanghai High-Speed Railway, completed in 2010/abbr. for 京滬高速鐵路|京沪高速铁路
Shanghai and Nanjing
alternative name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]
abbr. for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3], Shenzhen 深圳[Shen1 zhen4] and Hong Kong 香港[Xiang1 gang3]
Shanghai composite index (stock market index)
Shanghainese/Shanghai dialect

sentences.english: Last week China introduced the world's fastest scheduled service between Shanghai and Hangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 上周，中国速度最快的高铁沪杭高铁开通了。

sentences.english: Journey to the West, Feng Mengbo Solo, Bund 3 Gallery, Shanghai, China.
sentences.chinese: 《西游记》冯梦波个展，沪申画廊，中国上海。

sentences.english: He'll get to Shanghai in a day or two.
We will make an all-out effort to make your stay comfortable and pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 我们会尽力使你在沪期间过得舒适愉快。

sentences.english: Tours of the Shanghai, China Travel Service also will offer a similar line.
sentences.chinese: 而沪上的青旅，中旅等也将推出类似特价线路。

sentences.english: We will make an all-out effect to make your stay confortable and pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 我们会尽力使您在沪期间过得舒适愉快。

sentences.english: The suburban children who died were generally unsupervised and had migrant parents, according to education authorities.
sentences.chinese: 病亡的孩子住在郊区，父母是来沪打工的民工。

sentences.english: So far, nearly 10 percent of listed firms in Shenzhen and Shanghai are Net-related.
sentences.chinese: 截至目前，深沪两市已有近10%的公司与网络有关。

sentences.english: The SPC Huhang Railway Jinwei Branch in the south of the Industrial Zone is employed for the Industrial Zone railway transportation.
sentences.chinese: 依托工业区南侧的石化股份公司沪杭铁路金卫支线。

sentences.english: Shanghai-Hangzhou Highway divides the District into two parts of old city and new city, a striking contrast.
sentences.chinese: 沪杭高速公路也就成了新城和老镇的明显的分界线。

sentences.english: Is the governor of Illinois Shanghai also return fully loaded.
sentences.chinese: 是次伊州州长来沪同样满载而归。

sentences.english: The Shanghai Composite Index jumped after opening, but despite suffering some fluctuations reached near 3100 points during trading.
sentences.chinese: 沪指开盘后震荡上攻，盘中一度逼近3100点大关。

sentences.english: I go on trade to Shanghai. I do not get leave.
sentences.chinese: 我是公出去沪深的，否则不告面别。
上海沪杭高速铁路开始营运。
中国沪指创下两个月以来收市新高。

sentences.english: Chinese equities plummeted below 3100 points Friday as fears mounted over the fallout from Dubai's massive debt problems.
sentences.chinese: 受迪拜债务危机影响，沪指27日跌破3100点。

path screened by walls on both sides
